nodes.text: I thought I would magically become a Saint after that but I didn’t. I was 16 ❤️ Through the years I’ve called on God many times. The Father, Son, & Holy Spirit. 3 in 1 - Powerful combination those 3 are... lol
Gotten me outta more stuff than I care to mention. I am Eternally Grateful this Easter ❤️🙏🏻 God Bless You all & I hope you feel Love 🥰 https://t.co/ODywmz8ugQ

Not that it matters what race he was. We were talking about God & he asked me if I was saved. He said it’s easy!  I’ll pray with you and all you have to do is invite God into your heart & give your life to Him. I did. I’ll never forget it.

God is Love. I found God’s Love through Jesus Christ my Lord & Savior. Folks find Love in different ways. I asked God to come into my heart in the breakroom at McDonald’s w/a man who was studying to be a preacher. His name was Glenn & he was an assistant manager. African American
